articles.description: The Ukrainian president’s outrage is raising eyebrows at the NATO summit.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Court says Semenya can appeal testosterone limit for female athletes - Reuters
articles.description: Europe's top human rights court ruled in favour of Olympic runner Caster Semenya on Tuesday, saying courts in Switzerland should give her a new chance to fight a requirement that female athletes with high natural testosterone take drugs to lower it.
articles.content: July 11 (Reuters) - Europe's top human rights court ruled in favour of Olympic runner Caster Semenya on Tuesday, saying courts in Switzerland should give her a new chance to fight a requirement that … [+3526 chars]

articles.title: Record UK wage growth adds to inflation fears; Europe markets cautiously higher: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: European markets were higher after Wall Street snapped a three-day losing streak, with investors looking ahead to key U.S. inflation figures.
articles.content: Wages excluding bonuses in the U.K. grew at their joint-fastest rate on record in the three months to May, rising by 7.3% from the same period last year, the Office for National Statistics revealed T… [+2004 chars]

articles.title: Scientists Describe Shiniest Exoplanet: "Giant Mirror In Space" - NDTV
articles.description: Observations on the exoplanet were carried out by European Space Agency's Cheops (Characterising Exoplanet Satellite) mission.
articles.content:
Scientists said this is the first time a planet like this has been found so close to its star.
